item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: octavian
item.content:encoded: [vc_row height_ratio="60" rc_heading_color="light" rc_bg_type="image" rc_bg_image="107" rc_bg_color_overlay="dark" rc_bg_opacity_overlay="20" rc_bg_image_scroll_effect="opacity-scroll-effect" rc_font_color="#ffffff" rc_bg_color="#000000" min_height="360"][vc_column width="1/2" vertical_content_position="middle"][crocal_empty_space][crocal_title heading_tag="h1" heading="h1" animation="eut-appear-animation" appear_animation="eut-appear-down" animation_delay="0"]Help and contact[/crocal_title][vc_column_text animation="eut-fade-in" animation_delay="300" animation_duration="slow"]Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts behind the word mountains.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_bottom_multiplier="4x" columns_gap="60"][vc_column width="2/3" content_width="custom" custom_content_width="670"][vc_row_inner padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier="" el_id="getting-started"][vc_column_inner][crocal_title heading="h4" gradient_color="yes" gradient_color_2="blue"]Getting Started[/crocal_title][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_tta_accordion c_position="right" active_section="1" heading_tag="h5"][vc_tta_section title="Contact Forms in Crocal" tab_id="1528632318886-12468466-eb21"][vc_column_text]With this element, you can simply use any Contact Form 7 youve created. When using the Contact Form, the default layout is to have one field per row. However, you can have multiple fields with different styles in the same row by adding some HTML markup.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to use the Blog Element in Crocal" tab_id="1528632318957-fdd17d6f-6dce"][vc_column_text]The Blog element is undoubtedly one of the most important elements which most of the users will probably use. Based on that fact, Crocal really offers multiple options for this element.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Usage of the handcrafted Crocal elements" tab_id="1528632319021-0ffb7a47-ed4f"][vc_column_text]Crocal comes with the Visual Composer, a visual layout builder that allows you to forget about the syntax of shortcodes and create multiple layouts within minutes without writing a single line of code! You can edit, delete, increase and decrease the size of each item.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to use the Portfolio Element in Crocal" tab_id="1528632319077-34bb7886-b530"][vc_column_text]The Portfolio element is surely one of the most famous elements. Based on that fact, Crocal really offers multiple options for this element as well.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to use the Product Element in Crocal" tab_id="1528632319268-43733b36-1655"][vc_column_text]The Product element is anotherfamous element. Based on that fact, Crocal really offers multiple options for this element as well.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][vc_row_inner padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier="" el_id="rows"][vc_column_inner][crocal_title heading="h4" gradient_color="yes" gradient_color_2="blue"]Rows and Columns[/crocal_title][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_tta_accordion c_position="right" active_section="0" heading_tag="h5" collapsible_all="true"][vc_tta_section title="Set your Home and Blog page in Crocal" tab_id="1528626113072-b8cec954-c5af"][vc_column_text]Create a new page fromPages > Add New. Give a title, like Home, add the elements and settings you wish and then publish it. Next, create another page with the title you want for your blog. You do not need any content for your main blog page. The next thing is to tell WordPress to use your pages appropriately. Go toSettings > Readingand set the Front page displays to A static page. Set the home page you just created as the Front page, and the blog page you created as the Posts page and save your changes. Your Home and Blog pages are ready to go![/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to update Crocal and its required plugins" tab_id="1528626113110-cf3ae65b-9e20"][vc_column_text]This is for sure the easiest and fastest way to update Crocal. The only thing you have to do is to activate the theme update and enter your Themeforest username and an API key (from Envato).[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Import Full Demo Content in Crocal" tab_id="1528631179425-62acd014-a09c"][vc_column_text]With Crocal you have the possibility to import any of the demos with just ONE click.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Import on Demand in Crocal" tab_id="1528631219799-dd6086e0-beea"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Choose these specific pages, portfolios, posts and products you wish to import into your site. Select the ones you prefer via the available multi selectors under Crocal Demos and click the button Import Selected. Of course, you can still import the whole dummy content. It is up to you. Have fun!!![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][crocal_video video_link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C9tsrkRSw-Q"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Install Crocal and its required plugins" tab_id="1528631327612-7ca677f7-02d3"][vc_column_text]Before all else, you must setup a WordPress version on your server. After downloading the package, you will have Crocal folder and fildisi.zip file inside the Theme package. You can either choose to upload the Theme to your server via ftp (just upload the folder Crocal into the folder wp-content/themes) or via WordPress upload function (Appearance > Themes > Install Themes > Upload) using the crocal.zip file.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][vc_row_inner padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier="" el_id="navigation"][vc_column_inner][crocal_title heading="h4" gradient_color="yes" gradient_color_2="blue"]Navigation in Crocal[/crocal_title][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_tta_accordion c_position="right" active_section="0" heading_tag="h5" collapsible_all="true"][vc_tta_section title="Menu System Settings in Crocal" tab_id="1528634256196-0c7a5f7c-6d4b"][vc_column_text]Crocal comes with four predefined menu positions, one positioned in the header area (Header Menu), two in the TopBar positions (left and right) and the other in the copyright area (Footer Menu).[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Responsive Menu in Crocal" tab_id="1528634256269-93e3fd63-bb39"][vc_column_text]With Crocal you can assign a different menu as your responsive menu under Appearance > Menus. Many users need fewer menu items on mobiles so this feature will be very helpful. In case that you will not assign a separate responsive menu, you will get the default menu.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Bookmarks and Anchor Menu in Crocal" tab_id="1528634256340-db867d19-d554"][vc_column_text]Additionally, Crocal offers the Anchor Menu per page option. Notice that, anchor menus are optimal for navigation within one page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Create One Page navigation with Crocal" tab_id="1528634256412-a9c3e5cd-8fda"][vc_column_text]With Crocal, you can easily create a one-page site.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][vc_row_inner padding_top_multiplier="3x" padding_bottom_multiplier="" el_id="elements"][vc_column_inner][crocal_title heading="h4" gradient_color="yes" gradient_color_2="blue"]Elements[/crocal_title][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_tta_accordion c_position="right" active_section="0" heading_tag="h5" collapsible_all="true"][vc_tta_section title="Contact Forms in Crocal" tab_id="1528634507212-2f5d4822-1f1b"][vc_column_text]With this element, you can simply use any Contact Form 7 youve created. When using the Contact Form, the default layout is to have one field per row. However, you can have multiple fields with different styles in the same row by adding some HTML markup.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to use the Blog Element in Crocal" tab_id="1528634507298-81d536d6-09bd"][vc_column_text]The Blog element is undoubtedly one of the most important elements which most of the users will probably use. Based on that fact, Crocal really offers multiple options for this element.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="Usage of the handcrafted Crocal elements" tab_id="1528634507381-dcd07a4e-21ab"][vc_column_text]Crocal comes with the Visual Composer, a visual layout builder that allows you to forget about the syntax of shortcodes and create multiple layouts within minutes without writing a single line of code! You can edit, delete, increase and decrease the size of each item.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to use the Portfolio Element in Crocal" tab_id="1528634507467-c851327e-b3a7"][vc_column_text]The Portfolio element is surely one of the most famous elements. Based on that fact, Zuperlareally offers multiple options for this element as well.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title="How to use the Product Element in" tab_id="1528634731180-ac829cb4-e449"][vc_column_text]The Product element is anotherfamous element. Based on that fact, Crocal really offers multiple options for this element as well.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][crocal_empty_space height_multiplier="4x"][crocal_title heading="h4" increase_heading="120" gradient_color="yes" gradient_color_2="blue" margin_bottom="12"]Reach Out.[/crocal_title][crocal_title heading="h6"]Wed love to hear from you![/crocal_title][crocal_empty_space][crocal_contact_form id="363" inputs_shape="round" inputs_bg_color="custom" inputs_bg_color_custom="#f9f9f9" inputs_text_color="#999999" inputs_placeholder_color="#999999" inputs_borders="" inputs_focus_bg_color="custom" inputs_focus_bg_color_custom="#f9f9f9" button_shape="round"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" content_width="70" horizontal_content_position="right" rc_link_color="dark" rc_link_hover_color="primary-1" column_sticky="yes" mobile_width="hide" tablet_sm_content_width="reset" column_sticky_offset="0"][crocal_empty_space height_multiplier="3x"][crocal_title heading="h6"]Categories[/crocal_title][vc_column_text text_style="small-text"]Getting Started Rows and Columns Navigation in Crocal Elements[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space height_multiplier="2x"][crocal_title heading="h6"]Locate Us[/crocal_title][vc_column_text text_style="small-text"]38 Farlea Drive London, L2 3RJ United Kingdom +44 800 876 5432[/vc_column_text][crocal_empty_space height_multiplier="custom" height="18"][crocal_button button_text="View on map" button_size="small" button_shape="round" button_link="url:https%3A%2F%2Feuthemians.com%2Fthemes%2Fcrocal%2Fcrocal-app%2Fdownload%2F|||"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Testimonial 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Amazing product. Euthemians is the one-stop premium WordPress guys. If you want quality and top of the line support youve found it here. I highly recommend buying any theme from Euthemians.

item.title: Testimonial 2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Crocal has the best responsive function on the market is very fast, good adaptable and easy to handle. Support responds quickly and is helpful.

item.title: Testimonial 3
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The theme itself is an amazing product which we can only recommend to anybody looking to create a top quality highly customized website.

item.title: Testimonial 4
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This WP Theme gives you the possibility to reduce more and more your custom CSS and it offers you the full control on restricted areas since now.

item.title: Testimonial 5
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Euthemians is hands-down the most suitable timesaving multi-purpose theme for building any website you have in mind.

item.title: Testimonial 6
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Amazing product. Euthemians is the one-stop premium WordPress guys. If you want quality and top of the line support youve found it here. I highly recommend buying any theme from Euthemians.
